original_text: And Pharaoh sent, and, behold, there was not one of the cattle of the Israelites dead. And the heart of Pharaoh was hardened, and he did not let the people go.
korean_text: 바로가 사람을 보내어 본즉 이스라엘의 가축은 하나도 죽지 아니하였더라 그러나 바로의 마음이 완강하여 백성을 보내지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: there was not one of the cattle of the Israelites dead
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람의 가축 중 하나도 죽지 아니하였더라

sentences.original_text: And the heart of Pharaoh was hardened
and he did not let the people go
